tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE KnowledgeBaseContent (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE content_metadata (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    last_modified_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE content_metadata (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE tag_metadata (
    tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50),
    description VARCHAR(255),
    content_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content_metadata(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Content_Metadata (
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_title VARCHAR(255),
  content_body TEXT,
  author_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Content_Relationships (
  relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_id INT,
  tag_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES Content_Metadata(content_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES Content_Tags(tag_id)
);

CREATE TABLE metadata_content (
    content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author_name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE content_comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id UUID REFERENCES metadata_content(content_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    commenter_name TEXT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);
